Temporary Injuries.Name: Broken Arm
Temporary Injuries.Description: A broken arm makes it almost impossible to use any weapon effectively.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Broken Leg
Temporary Injuries.Description: A broken leg severely limits mobility and can take a long time to heal.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Broken Ribs
Temporary Injuries.Description: Several ribs have been broken by blunt force, making every single breath a painful process.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Bruised Leg
Temporary Injuries.Description: A heavily bruised leg severely limits mobility, but won't take long to recover from.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Crushed Finger
Temporary Injuries.Description: An unlucky hit crushed a finger, making it painful to maintain a firm grip.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Dislocated Shoulder
Temporary Injuries.Description: A hard hit has knocked the shoulder out of its joint, making it hard to move the arm at all.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Fractured Elbow
Temporary Injuries.Description: A fractured elbow makes it hard to block or parry any attacks effectively.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Fractured Hand
Temporary Injuries.Description: Minor bone fractures at the hand make it difficult to hold firmly any weapon.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Fractured Ribs
Temporary Injuries.Description: Fractured ribs send a wave of pain through the body with every breath.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Smashed Hand
Temporary Injuries.Description: A hand smashed by blunt force makes it almost impossible to hold on to any kind of weapon.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Spained Ankle
Temporary Injuries.Description: A sprained ankle makes even the quickest man hobble across the battlefield.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Broken Nose
Temporary Injuries.Description: Blunt force broke this character's nose, making it hard for them to catch breath properly.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Crushed Windpipe
Temporary Injuries.Description: A blow to the neck injured the windpipe, making it very hard and painful to draw breath, let alone to keep fighting.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Fractured Skull
Temporary Injuries.Description: This character's skull has sustained multiple fractures, and the brain has sustained blunt trauma leading to swelling and a build-up of pressure inside the skull.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Severe Concussion
Temporary Injuries.Description: A severe concussion makes it hard to focus, see or even walk straight. Not to mention the nausea and in some cases also amnesia.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Cut Achilles Tendon
Temporary Injuries.Description: An injury like this makes even the quickest man hobble across the battlefield.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Cut Arm
Temporary Injuries.Description: A deep cut at the arm makes it difficult to use.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Cut Arm Sinew
Temporary Injuries.Description: A partially cut arm sinew makes it difficult to put force into any strike.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Cut Artery_Stage_2
Temporary Injuries.Description: An artery has been cut, leading to massive hemorrhaging and ultimately death if not treated out of combat. If survived, it is followed by severely lowered constitution due to loss of blood.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Cut Artery
Temporary Injuries.Description: An artery has been cut, leading to massive hemorrhaging and ultimately death if not treated out of combat. If survived, it is followed by severely lowered constitution due to loss of blood.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Cut Leg Muscle
Temporary Injuries.Description: A cut into the muscles of the leg makes any quick and sudden movements impossible.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Deep Abdominal Cut
Temporary Injuries.Description: A deep cut at the abdomen has injured the muscle and makes it painful to move or even stand upright, reducing the constitution of this character.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Deep Chest Cut
Temporary Injuries.Description: A deep, bleeding cut into the chest and pectoral muscle makes it hard to keep standing.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Exposed Ribs
Temporary Injuries.Description: A deep cut to the side peeled the skin right off of this character's rib cage.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Split Hand
Temporary Injuries.Description: A sharp cut split the hand right down the middle. Until healed, it can barely be used anymore.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Split Shoulder
Temporary Injuries.Description: A deep cut has split this character's shoulder open, injuring the muscle tissue and severely limiting mobility of the arms.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Cut Neck Vein_Stage_2
Temporary Injuries.Description: A vein on the throat has been cut, leading to massive hemorrhaging and ultimately death if not treated out of combat. If survived, it is followed by a period of severely lowered constitution due to loss of blood, and will leave a menacing scar.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Cut Neck Vein
Temporary Injuries.Description: A vein on the throat has been cut, leading to massive hemorrhaging and ultimately death if not treated out of combat. If survived, it is followed by a period of severely lowered constitution due to loss of blood, and will leave a menacing scar.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Deep Face Cut
Temporary Injuries.Description: A jagged cut across the face is bleeding profusely over eyes, nose and mouth.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Grazed Neck_Stage_2
Temporary Injuries.Description: A grazing wound on the neck bleeds profusely. If survived, it is followed by lowered constitution due to loss of blood.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Grazed Neck
Temporary Injuries.Description: A grazing wound on the neck bleeds profusely. If survived, it is followed by lowered constitution due to loss of blood.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Pierced Cheek
Temporary Injuries.Description: Contrary to what one might think, having an additional hole in the cheek does not help with breathing.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Ripped Ear
Temporary Injuries.Description: This character's ear almost got torn off, sending blood down their head and neck, and making them less aware of their surroundings.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Split Nose
Temporary Injuries.Description: A close swing split this character's nose in two and made any attempt to breathe an exercise in swallowing copious amounts of blood.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Grazed Kidney
Temporary Injuries.Description: Abdominal pain, blood in the urine and always the danger of infection. A grazed kidney is a severe risk to the life of any character, draining their constitution.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Injured Knee Cap
Temporary Injuries.Description: The sensitive knee cap has been injured, resulting in pain with every movement and severely limiting the mobility of this character.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Injured Shoulder
Temporary Injuries.Description: Injured muscles in the shoulder make it hard to put any force into a strike.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Pierced Arm Muscles
Temporary Injuries.Description: A piercing attack has punctured the arm and injured muscle tissue, limiting it's mobility.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Pierced Chest
Temporary Injuries.Description: A piercing attack has punctured the chest, injured muscle tissue and grazed the ribs. Although no vital organs have been hit, it's still painful to just breathe.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Pierced Hand
Temporary Injuries.Description: Having a hole in the hand may not stop a determined fighter, but it does make handling a weapon more difficult.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Pierced Leg Muscles
Temporary Injuries.Description: Punctured leg muscles make any attempts to do quick and sudden movements a painful experience, if not outright impossible.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Pierced Lung
Temporary Injuries.Description: A second opening for air proves of little use, except for sounding like a bagpipe.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Pierced Side
Temporary Injuries.Description: A piercing attack has punctured the side, injured muscle tissue and grazed the ribs. Although no vital organs have been hit, it's still painful to just breathe.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Stabbed Guts
Temporary Injuries.Description: A wound at the intestines drains constitution, and the high chance of infection and the prospect of a slow and painful death doesn't help either.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Crushed Windpipe
Temporary Injuries.Description: A blow to the neck injured the windpipe, making it very hard and painful to draw breath, let alone to keep fighting.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Grazed Eye Socket
Temporary Injuries.Description: A blow grazed and ripped the tissue close to the eye, causing it to fill with blood and swell shut.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Grazed Neck_Stage_2
Temporary Injuries.Description: A grazing wound on the neck bleeds profusely. If survived, it is followed by lowered constitution due to loss of blood.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Grazed Neck
Temporary Injuries.Description: A grazing wound on the neck bleeds profusely. If survived, it is followed by lowered constitution due to loss of blood.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Pierced Cheek
Temporary Injuries.Description: Contrary to what one might think, having an additional hole in the cheek does not help with breathing.

Temporary Injuries.Name: Ripped Ear
Temporary Injuries.Description: This character's ear almost got torn off, sending blood down their head and neck, and making them less aware of their surroundings.

Perminent Injuries.Name: Brain Damage
Perminent Injuries.Description: A hard hit to the head shook some things up and didn't exactly benefit this character's cognitive skills. On the bright side, he may now be just too stupid to realize when it's time to run.

Perminent Injuries.Name: Broken Elbow Joint
Perminent Injuries.Description: A broken elbow that never fully healed hinders all movement of the arm and severely reduces combat effectiveness.

Perminent Injuries.Name: Broken Knee
Perminent Injuries.Description: This character took something to the knee, and it never fully healed. Lunging forward or dodging can be painful, and it lacks any grace.

Perminent Injuries.Name: Partially Collapsed Lung
Perminent Injuries.Description: A part of the lung has died, making it very hard for this character to catch breath

Perminent Injuries.Name: Maimed Foot
Perminent Injuries.Description: An injury to the foot has never fully healed, making it hard to win any dancing competitions or otherwise move around quickly.

Perminent Injuries.Name: Missing Ear
Perminent Injuries.Description: Luckily, a missing ear isn't that much of a hindrance for this character. But it does look gross.

Perminent Injuries.Name: Missing Eye
Perminent Injuries.Description: A missing eye makes it difficult to judge distance properly, and limits the field of view.

Perminent Injuries.Name: Missing Finger
Perminent Injuries.Description: A missing finger makes it harder to firmly grab a weapon or shield, but it also makes for a good story.

Perminent Injuries.Name: Missing Nose
Perminent Injuries.Description: A gaping hole is all that is left of the nose, making this character hard to look at.

Perminent Injuries.Name: Traumatised
Perminent Injuries.Description: This character has been to the other side. Faced with his own mortality, the experience of dying and coming back has left him a broken man.

Perminent Injuries.Name: Weakened Heart
Perminent Injuries.Description: Past injuries left this character with a weakened heart, severely lowering his constitution.
